Posts.Content: I want to find my joy again. Learn to play the mandolin and re-learn my guitar. Find the time to play and not work so hard.
Posts.Title: while we all pray for improved health, do we have a New Year's Resolution for fun?

Posts.Content: I had my eyes checked mid chemo. My eye dr didn't recommend new lenses until my treatment was over. I will be going back for a check, but I do notice that my eyesight has changed where as before I was stable in my correction. My eye sight is always blurry, without glasses, but if yours is newly blurry, I would call my eye doctor just to be sure.
Posts.Title: Vision: Has anyone had their vision deteriorate?

Posts.Content: Anything NOT pastel. I always go for the vivid colors.
Posts.Title: I thought it would be great to see what your favorite color is, so, what is your favorite color?

Posts.Content: All very good advice. Rest when you need to. Do what your doctor tells you to do. Everything will turn out fine. One day at a time. T
Posts.Title: Here's the plan---What advice or experiences can you share?
